Title: 15k to 250k as of today
Author: u/BarryBurkman
Score: 328 | Comments: 38 | Upvote Ratio: 95.0%
Created: 2025-10-07 01:54:19
Content: I’m so fucking proud of myself. Started with about $15,000 in March 2020 Made a number of mistakes along the way from not knowing a damn thing about stocks and how much to invest to having a nice balance of ETF and some more risky high growth stocks. have taken some profit over the years and then use that money to diversify. Including 100 stocks of Exxonmobil of 30 bucks that I had cashed out at $115.

I’ve got a good mix of old faithful like IBM Microsoft and Google with a hefty amount of quantum and energy stocks really taken off from me for the last 18 months. 


================================================================================

Title: Anyone shifting investments to Asian ETFs?
Author: u/Gipaldo
Score: 8 | Comments: 29 | Upvote Ratio: 61.0%
Created: 2025-10-09 10:09:58
Content: Fairly new to investing and wondering what others thoughts are in Asia market ETFs like EEMA, VWO, ASEA, VPL etc? 

With the current political uncertainty in the US I’m thinking about moving some investments abroad. The declining dollar has me interested in UDN 

Would love to hear what those who are more informed than myself think. 
================================================================================
